## Excutive Summay of the project

This is an R Markdown document written as part of Coursera course on [_**Reproducible Templates for Analysis & Dissemination**_](https://www.coursera.org/learn/reproducible-templates-analysis/home/welcome).This project consist of the most important topics and skills I learnt from it. It is recommended for every person persuading development in his career.

## Most important skills out of this course

* Concept of Reproducibility
* Literate programming
* Dynamic Documentation
* Version control like git & github
* R Markdown & Knitr
* Hands on exercises for each skill in the course
